FindMy2ElfSiblingsStart.text: Hey, have you seen my siblings anywhere?

Text.text: Oh. And no, they are not human like me, they are elves.
Could you help me find them?
Oh thank you! Thank you! They have to be around here somewhere.
... But why?... I will keep trying to find them, let me know if you change your mind.
Have not seen even one of them yet.
Okay, so we know where one is; now where is the other?
Thats both of them. Thank you so much for your help.
Here, have this knife. Its useful if you need to cut some rope or cobwebs.

FindMy2ElfSiblingsCompleteHuman1.text: Putting my knife to good use?

FindMy2ElfSiblingsCompleteHuman3.text: I do not think I ever would of found them without your help. Thanks again!
